scripts.patch:
read -p 'Confirm create new patch (0.0.x) to npm: (y/n) ' -n 1 -r 
 if [[ $REPLY =~ ^[Yy]$ ]] 
 then 
 yarn npm-patch 
 fi
scripts.minor:
read -p 'Confirm create new minor version (0.x.0) to npm (y/n) ' -n 1 -r 
 if [[ $REPLY =~ ^[Yy]$ ]] 
 then 
 yarn npm-minor 
 fi
scripts.major:
read -p 'Confirm create new major version (x.0.0) to npm (y/n) ' -n 1 -r 
 if [[ $REPLY =~ ^[Yy]$ ]] 
 then 
 yarn npm-major 
 fi
